mapper.select: SELECT id as id, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, email as email, gender as gender, ip_address as ipAddress, last_update as lastUpdate FROM users ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{beginRow}
SELECT id as id, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, email as email, gender as gender, ip_address as ipAddress, last_update as lastUpdate FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, ip_address = #{ipAddress}, last_update = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
insert into users( first_name, last_name, email, gender, ip_address, last_update ) values( #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{ipAddress}, NOW() )
